item.title: Andrey Makarevich
item.description: Andrey Vadimovich Makarevich PAR is a Soviet and Russian rock musician and the founder of Russia's oldest still active rock band Mashina Vremeni.

item.title: Oleg Mityaev
item.description: Oleg Grigorievich Mityaev is a Russian bard, musician and actor.

item.title: Yuri Loza
item.description: Yuri Eduardovich Loza is a Russian singer, poet, and composer.

item.title: Aleksandr Marshal
item.description: Aleksandr Vitalyevich Minkov, better known by stage name Alexander Marshal(Russian: Александр Маршал), is a Russian singer, songwriter, and musician; Honored Artist of the Russian Federation (2007).

item.title: Semyon Slepakov
item.description: Semyon Sergeyevich Slepakov is a Russian-Jewish producer, screenwriter and comedian who was in the past captain of the KVN team Sbornaya Pyatigorska. He with two other comedians created the show Nasha Russia, TV-series Interns, Univer, Univer. New Dorm, SashaTanya. He also had a cameo role in the film Our Russia. The Balls of Fate.

item.title: Alexander Rosenbaum
item.description: Alexander Yakovlevich Rosenbaum PAR is a Russian bard from Saint Petersburg. He is best known as an interpreter of the blatnaya pesnya genre. Modern singers in this genre, such as Mikhail Shufutinsky often sing Rosenbaum's songs.
